title: Families Then and Now

vocab.definition: A time in the past, before now
People in a family who are about the same age
Family members who lived before you were born

teachingNotes: Use family photos from different time periods. Compare how families lived long ago vs. today. Discuss family traditions.

sample.question: Name one thing families do together now.
Name one thing families did long ago.
Who takes care of children in a family?
Name a family tradition you have.

truefalse.question: Your grandparents were children before you were born.
Families long ago didn't have computers.
Families today can be different sizes.
Children long ago played video games.
Only grandparents are part of a family.

multiplechoice.question: How did children long ago play differently than today?
What do families today use to keep food cold?
How did families travel long ago?
Who can be in a family?
What is a family tradition?
